attributes.action: resist the introduction of random testing of motorists
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: You are driving along and a police officer stops you - no reason - you have done nothing wrong - he/she just decides to stop you at random. Think about how that would make you feel - there was nothing wrong with your driving - you may even be late and frustratingly obeying ALL road restrictions, limits etc. Having nothing to hide you have nothing to worry about - they say - add an extra 10 minutes to every journey you ever take just in case you get stopped at random? - no way - we say!
